headline: Dow Jones Futures: Trump Tariff 'Flexibility' Lifts Market; 5 Stocks Near Buy Points
summary: The stock market edged up last week as President Trump said Friday that he sees tariff "flexibility." Spotify, Netflix are near buy points.

raw.headline: Dow Jones Futures: Trump Tariff 'Flexibility' Lifts Market; 5 Stocks Near Buy Points

headline: Could Netflix Stock Help You Retire a Millionaire?
summary: There are few businesses that have taken care of investors the way Netflix (NASDAQ: NFLX) has.  Since the company's initial public offering in 2002, shares have skyrocketed, rising 80,080% (as of March 19).  Netflix's market cap today exceeds $400 billion.

headline: Every Netflix Investor Should Keep an Eye on This Number
summary: Netflix is changing how it measures success. Some of the old headline-writing metrics are going away; here's what investors should monitor instead.

headline: Apple is reportedly willing to lose $1 billion every year just to fuel its streaming ambitions
summary: Unlike other peers, the streaming service's small library focuses almost exclusively on original content like Severance and Ted Lasso.
